TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AssignCulture extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.TaskExtension

summary.span: 类：AssignCulture

span.span: Class: AssignCulture

summary.span: 此任务使用资源文件名列表，并设置特性，其中包含文件名中嵌入的区域性名称：

span.span: This task takes a list of resource file names and sets an attribute that contains the culture name embedded in the file name:

summary.span: MyResources.fr.resx ==> Culture='fr'

span.span: MyResources.fr.resx ==> Culture='fr'

summary.span: 该任务还可返回“非特定区域性”文件名的列表，如下所示：

span.span: The task can also return a list of "Culture-neutral" file names, like:

summary.span: MyGlyph.fr.bmp ==> MyGlyph.bmp [Culture='fr']

span.span: MyGlyph.fr.bmp ==> MyGlyph.bmp [Culture='fr']

summary.span: 这是因为嵌入的资源是以这种方式引用的。

span.span: This is because embedded resources are referred to this way.

summary.span: 此任务有很多极端情况。

span.span: There are plenty of corner cases with this task.

summary.span: 有关更多详细信息，请参阅单元测试。

span.span: See the unit test for more details.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 此传出的文件的列表与传入“Files”列表完全相同，但如果特定文件名为以下格式，则将添加特性名称“Culture”：

span.span: This outgoing list of files is exactly the same as the incoming Files list except that an attribute name "Culture" will have been added if the particular file name is in the form:

summary.span: MyResource.<any-valid-culture-id>.resx

span.span: MyResource.<any-valid-culture-id>.resx

summary.span: Culture 的值将为“<any-valid-culture-id>”。

span.span: The value of Culture will be "<any-valid-culture-id>".

summary.span: 如果文件中的传入项已具有 Culture 特性，则改用原始特性。

span.span: If the incoming item from Files already has a Culture attribute then that original attribute is used instead.

value.span: 的列表 ，其中添加了每个项的一个 区域性 元数据条目。

span.span: The list of , with a Culture metadata entry added to each item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该属性的传入项 已包含 `Culture` 元数据条目，则使用原始元数据条目。If the incoming item from the property already contains a `Culture` metadata entry, the original metadata entry is used. 如果文件名包含有效的区域性标识符，则该任务仅分配 `Culture` 元数据条目。The task only assigns a `Culture` metadata entry if the file name contains a valid culture identifier. 区域性标识符必须位于文件名中最后两个点之间。The culture identifier must be between the last two dots in the filename.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AssignedFilesWithCulture As ITaskItem()
public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ AssignedFilesWithCulture { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 这是 AssignedFiles 的子集，它的已结束的所有项都分配了 Culture。

span.span: This is a subset of AssignedFiles that has all of the items that ended up have a Culture assigned to them.

summary.span: 这包括在传入 Files 列表中已有 Culture 的项，以及分配了 Culture 的项，因为它们的文件名中嵌入了有效的区域性 ID。

span.span: This includes items that already had a Culture in the incoming Files list as well as items that were assigned a Culture because they had a valid culture ID embedded in their file name.

summary.span: 以下等式始终成立：

span.span: The following is always true:

summary.span: AssignedFiles = AssignedFilesWithCulture + AssignedFilesWithNoCulture

span.span: AssignedFiles = AssignedFilesWithCulture + AssignedFilesWithNoCulture

value.span: 具有Culture元数据条目的的子集。

span.span: A subset of that have a Culture metadata entry.

summary.span: 此列表与 Files 列表或 AssignedFiles 列表具有相同数量的项目。

span.span: This list has the same number of items as the Files list or the AssignedFiles list.

summary.span: 此列表中的项具有 Files 或 AssignedFiles 中的文件名，但如果文件名中嵌入了区域性，会将其去除。

span.span: Items in this list have the file name from Files or AssignedFiles but with the culture stripped if it was embedded in the file name.

summary.span: 例如，如果 Files 中的传入项为：

span.span: So for example, if the incoming item in Files was:

summary.span: MyBitmap.fr.bmp

span.span: MyBitmap.fr.bmp

summary.span: 则 CultureNeutralAssignedFiles 中的相应文件将为：

span.span: then the corresponding file in CultureNeutralAssignedFiles will be:

summary.span: MyBitmap.bmp

span.span: MyBitmap.bmp

summary.span: 仅当区域性是有效的区域性标识符时才会将其去除。

span.span: The culture will only be stripped if it is a valid culture identifier.

summary.span: 例如，

span.span: So for example,

summary.span: MyCrazyFile.XX.txt

span.span: MyCrazyFile.XX.txt

summary.span: 将产生完全相同的文件名：

span.span: will result in exactly the same file name:

summary.span: MyCrazyFile.XX.txt

span.span: MyCrazyFile.XX.txt

summary.span: 因为“XX”不是有效的区域性标识符。

span.span: because 'XX' is not a valid culture identifier.

value.span: 不具有区域性元数据条目的的子集。

span.span: A subset of that do not have a Culture metadata entry.

summary.span: 要向其分配区域性的文件的传入列表。

span.span: The incoming list of files to assign a culture to.

value.span: 要为其分配区域性并且嵌入了区域性名称的文件的列表。

span.span: The list of files with embedded culture names to assign a culture to.
